about_the_game:
Get ready to blast your way to freedom in Boom Blaster, the ultimate platform combat adventure that will keep you hooked for hours on end! As a space prison inmate, your destiny is clear: kill every obstacle to earn your freedom.

Get ready to face a barrage of challenges, from tiny insects to massive bosses, but don't worry, you'll have a wide range of skills to resist and overpower them all. Each hero has unique strengths, so choose wisely to maximize your chances of success.

With an incredible array of weapons, including machine guns, grenades, lasers, flamethrowers, and rockets, you'll have everything you need to unleash explosive destruction and take down your enemies easily.

But the adventure doesn't end there - Boom Blaster also features thrilling rescue missions, including high-speed chases, intense flights, uncovering secret artifacts, and experiencing unexpected endings. And with an insane amount of content, you'll never run out of exciting challenges to tackle.


Featuring:
  • Enjoy hand-drawn graphics and detailed animations that bring the world of Boom Blaster to life.
  • Take on intense boss fights and challenging levels in this action-packed side-scrolling shooter.
  • Choose your hero wisely and use their unique abilities to your advantage in battle.
  • Unleash various powerful weapons, including machine guns, grenades, lasers, flamethrowers, and rockets.
  • Embark on exciting rescue missions, including chases, flights, and treasure hunts to uncover hidden artifacts and unexpected endings.

Ready to embark on the journey of a lifetime and earn your freedom in Boom Blaster? Download the game now and let the blasting begin!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP,Vista,7,8,10
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.0 GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon X1300/NVidia GeForce 6600 GT or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-Compatible Sound Card

short_description: Boom Blaster is a hand-drawn, side-scrolling shoot'em up with intense boss fights! Blast your way through each level with a range of weapons and unique hero abilities in this exciting and challenging action game.
